sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; const Scorecard = ({ type, inningsNumber, data }) => { console.log(`Scorecard render:`, { type, inningsNumber, data }); if (!data) return null; // Calculate top position based on type const getTopPosition = () => { switch (type) { case 'batting': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'bowling': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'partnerships': return 'top-[240px]'; case 'fallOfWickets': return 'top-[240px]'; default: return 'top-[240px]'; } }; const renderPartnershipAndFow = (partnerships, fow) => { if (!partnerships?.length && !fow?.length) return null; return (
{/* Partnerships Section */}
PARTNERSHIPS
BATTER 1
BATTER 2
RUNS
BALLS
SR
{data.partnerships?.map((p, index) => (
{p.player1}
{p.player2}
{p.runs}
{p.balls}
{((p.runs / p.balls) * 100).toFixed(2)}
))}
{/* Fall of Wickets Section */}
FALL OF WICKETS
NO
BATSMEN
SCR
OVR
{data.fallOfWickets?.map((w, index) => (
{w.wicketNumber}
{w.shortName}
{w.score}
{w.over}
))}
); }; const renderContent = () => { switch (type) { case 'batting': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{/* Header Row with Title and Summary */}
{data.teamName} - BATTING
{/* Batting Table */}
{/* Table Headers */}
BATTER
R
B
4S
6S
DISMISSAL
SR
{/* Batting Rows */}
{data.batting.map((batter, index) => (
{batter.name}
{batter.runs ?? '-'}
{batter.balls ?? '-'}
{batter.fours ?? '-'}
{batter.sixes ?? '-'}
{batter.dismissal?.split(' ').map((word, i, arr) => ( {word} {i < arr.length - 1 && } ))}
{batter.strikeRate ?? '-'}
))}
{/* Extras and Total Row */}
Extras: {data.summary.extras.total} (W: {data.summary.extras.wide}, NB: {data.summary.extras.noBall}, B: {data.summary.extras.bye}, LB: {data.summary.extras.legBye})
Total: {data.summary.score}/{data.summary.wickets} ({data.summary.overs} overs)
{renderPartnershipAndFow(data.partnerships, data.fallOfWickets)}
); case 'bowling': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{data.teamName} - BOWLING
{/* Bowling Table */}
{/* Table Headers */}
BOWLER
O
M
R
W
WD
NB
ECO
{/* Bowling Rows */}
{data.bowling.map((bowler, index) => (
{bowler.name}
{bowler.overs}
{bowler.maidens}
{bowler.runs}
{bowler.wickets}
{bowler.wides}
{bowler.noBalls}
{bowler.economy}
))}
); case 'details': return (
{/* Title Section */}
{/* Main Title */}
{data.teamName} - PARTNERSHIPS & FALL OF WICKETS
{/* Content */}
{/* Partnerships Section */}
PARTNERSHIPS
BATTER 1
BATTER 2
RUNS
BALLS
SR
{data.partnerships?.map((p, index) => (
{p.player1}
{p.player2}
{p.runs}
{p.balls}
{((p.runs / p.balls) * 100).toFixed(2)}
))}
{/* Fall of Wickets Section */}
FALL OF WICKETS
NO
BATSMEN
SCR
OVR
{data.fallOfWickets?.map((w, index) => (
{w.wicketNumber}
{w.shortName}
{w.score}
{w.over}
))}
); default: return
Unknown section type: {type}
; } }; // Update the variants with more sophisticated animations const variants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: -50, scale: 0.98, filter: 'blur(10px)' }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, filter: 'blur(0px)', transition: { type: "spring", damping: 30, stiffness: 200, mass: 0.8, delayChildren: 0.3, staggerChildren: 0.1 } }, exit: { opacity: 0, y: 50, scale: 0.95, filter: 'blur(10px)', transition: { type: "spring", damping: 25, stiffness: 200, mass: 0.8, duration: 0.4 } } }; // Add child variants for staggered content animation const childVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, y: -20, scale: 0.95 }, animate: { opacity: 1, y: 0, scale: 1, transition: { type: "spring", damping: 20, stiffness: 300 } }, exit: { opacity: 0, y: 20, scale: 0.95 } }; // Update the backdrop animation const backdropVariants = { initial: { opacity: 0, backdropFilter: 'blur(0px)' }, animate: { opacity: 0.95, backdropFilter: 'blur(10px)', transition: { duration: 0.4, ease: "easeOut" } }, exit: { opacity: 0, backdropFilter: 'blur(0px)', transition: { duration: 0.3, ease: "easeIn" } } }; return ( <> {/* Animated backdrop */} {/* Main container */}
{/* Enhanced background container */}
{/* Content container with staggered children */} {renderContent()}
{/* Enhanced animation styles */} ); }; export default Scorecard;
